Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to conducting a study on the feasibility of using the Triboro rail line as a public transit line co-mingling with freight service
Summary: Relates to conducting a study on the feasibility of using the Triboro rail line as a public transit line co-mingling with freight services.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the metropolitan transportation authority to study the feasibility of co-mingling public transit and freight service on the proposed Triboro line along the rail right-of-way running from Co-op City in the Bronx, through Queens, and terminating in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn
